scripts.start:dev: set REACT_APP_PROXY=http://localhost:8080&& concurrently "cd backend && nodemon server.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build:test: cd frontend && set REACT_APP_PROXY=http://localhost:8080&& npm run build
scripts.start:test: set NODE_ENV=production&& set PORT=8080&& set REACT_APP_PROXY=http://localhost:8080&& cd backend && pm2 start server.js
scripts.build:prod: cd frontend && export REACT_APP_PROXY=https://bookmarkdofficial.com&& npm run build
scripts.start:prod: export NODE_ENV=production&& export PORT=80&& export REACT_APP_PROXY=https://bookmarkdofficial.com&& cd backend && authbind --deep pm2 start server.js
